title: PAGI 3-Tier Skill Manifest
description: Standardized manifest for Sovereign skills (core / import / ephemeral). Enforces kb_layers_allowed and trust_tier.

trust_tier.description: core = Tier 1 (human-authored), import = Tier 2 (community/quarantined), generated = Tier 3 (orchestrator-generated)

kb_layers_allowed.description: KB layers (1-9) this skill may access. Only core may include 1 or 9.
